name: Quick Escape - Bar
description:
In the second episode your mission is to figure out how to escape the bar. The door you need to open is locked with six keys. Solve the puzzles and collect the keys to escape!
Quick Escape games are short five minute brain teasers where you have to find and combine items, solve mini-puzzles and use your smartphone to escape.

Features:
Unique mini-puzzles
Items combining
Tricky brain teasers
Smartphone's magic
100% Free
